tool_description: Generates comprehensive compliance reports by aggregating results from multiple validation tools and providing actionable recommendations for document improvement.

validation_results.description: Array of validation results from other tools

document_title.description: Title of the document being validated

target_style.description: Target academic style: APA, MLA, Chicago, Harvard, IEEE, or Vancouver

priority_level.description: Priority for recommendations: critical, important, or all

report_format.description: Output format: summary, detailed, or executive

error_messages: Empty validation results: Provide at least one validation result.
Invalid target style: Use one of [APA, MLA, Chicago, Harvard, IEEE, Vancouver].
Invalid priority level: Use critical, important, or all.
Invalid report format: Use summary, detailed, or executive.
Too many validation results: Maximum 20 validation result entries allowed.
Missing document title: Document title cannot be empty.
usage: Provide validation_results from other tools along with document_title and target_style. Configure reporting options to generate comprehensive compliance reports.

critical_issues.description: Critical issues that must be addressed

next_steps.description: Suggested next steps for document improvement
